chinese: h.存在；生物
english: being

chinese: 宇宙的出现是大爆炸的结果。
english: The universe came into being as a result of a big bang

chinese: n.家庭教师，指导教师 凶 当•…的家庭教师
english: tutor

chinese: 这个家庭教师正在辅导小男孩的功课。
english: The tutor is helping the little boy with his homework

chinese: n.降落伞
english: parachute

chinese: 这只狐狸用降落伞来下降。
english: The fox uses a parachute to descend

chinese: adj.事实的
english: factual

chinese: 这本书里有关于科学的事实性信息。
english: This book contains factual information about science

chinese: 以.增强；加剧
english: intensify

chinese: 麦克风能扩大我说话的音量。
english: The microphone intensifies the loudness of my voice

chinese: D.重疊，重复 V.（部分地）重叠
english: overlap

chinese: 他们有共同感兴趣的话题。
english: There is some overlap in the topics they are interested in

chinese: v. 凌驾
english: override

chinese: 健康的身体比工作重要。
english: Health and well-being overrides the importance of work

chinese: 最终
english: ultimately

chinese: 最终，他决定去离家近的那所大学。
english: Ultimately, he decided to go to the university close to his home

chinese: vt. 向⋯•⋯保证，使确信
english: assure

chinese: 我可以向你保证，狗会得到很好的照顾。
english: I can assure you that the dog will be well cared for

chinese: ad），简短的，扼要的 做…⋯的摘要
english: brief

chinese: 这封简短的信解释了她为何想辞职。
english: The brief letter explains why she wants to quit

chinese: adj. 加强的
english: intensive

chinese: 高考强化训练让他精疲力竭。
english: The intensive study for the college entrance exam made him exhausted

chinese: adj 恰当的；有（做某事的）倾向
english: apt

chinese: 他说的话是对这种情况恰如其分的描述。
english: What he said was an apt description of the situation

chinese: n. 大修；彻底革新 uE. 解体检修，大修
english: overhaul

chinese: 这次事故过后，他的旧车需要彻底大修。
english: His old car will need a complete overhaul after the accident

chinese: adj.全景的
english: panoramic

chinese: 她正在用智能手机拍一张全景图。
english: She's taking a panoramic picture using her smartphone

chinese: 认知
english: cognition

chinese: 建立道德认知与获取知识一样重要。
english: Developing moral cognition is as important as acquiring knowledge

chinese: adj.基本的；主要的 n.【天主教】枢机主教，红衣主教；基数
english: cardinal

chinese: 基数是告诉你一组中有多少事物的数字。
english: Cardinal numbers are numbers that tell you how many things there are in a group
